post.description: Enables Spike Protection for the specified projects.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_slug
parameters.description: The ID or slug of the organization the projects belong to.

schema.description: Django Rest Framework serializer for incoming Spike Protection API payloads

projects.description: A list of the slugs of the projects to enable Spike Protection for. Set to `$all` to enable Spike Protection for all the projects in the organization.

delete.description: Disables Spike Protection for the specified projects.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_slug
parameters.description: The ID or slug of the organization the projects belong to.

schema.description: Django Rest Framework serializer for incoming Spike Protection API payloads

projects.description: A list of the slugs of the projects to disable Spike Protection for. Set to `$all` to disable Spike Protection for all the projects in the organization.
